product_name: The North Face Kardiak Triclimate 3-in-1 Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: With a clean, ski-inspired aesthetic, the Kardiak Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket by The North Face offers waterproof protection and season-long versatility thanks to fast, convenient convertibility. Three different ways to wear the system: wear shell jacket and zip-in liner jacket together for maximum protection or wear either piece on its own as weather warrants. HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Zip handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal goggles pocket. Fully adjustable, removable and helmet-compatible hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit. Powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out. Cinch adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; core vents let you control airflow and your comfort. The North Face Kardiak Triclimate zip-in/out polyester fleece liner jacket offers warmth without extra bulk. Liner jacket has zippered handwarmer pockets for convenience when wearing liner on its own. Easy zip-in system mates the liner jacket and shell jacket together for added warmth and allows easy reach-in access to the shell's interior features.
